settings.privacyIntro: Hexagon Studio respects the privacy of users of its mobile applications.
settings.privacySection1Text: Hexagon Studio does not collect, store, or process any personal data from users of its applications.
settings.privacySection2Text: Any data created within the applications (such as user-generated content or progress) is stored locally on the user's device and is not transmitted to external servers.
settings.privacySection3Text: Hexagon Studio applications request only the permissions necessary for the core functionality of the apps.
settings.privacySection4Text: Hexagon Studio does not sell, rent, or share user data with third parties.
settings.privacySection5Text: At this time, Hexagon Studio applications do not use third-party services that collect user data.
settings.privacySection6Text: Hexagon Studio takes reasonable measures to ensure that applications do not transmit user data over the internet.
settings.privacySection7Text: This privacy policy may be updated if the functionality of Hexagon Studio applications changes. Any updates will be reflected on this page.
settings.privacySection8Text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact:
